title: [Port Valley, Vineyards]
description: Great red strawberries grow here, big as the nose on a dwarf.  Moonlight shines down on the field, illuminating the area in its soft glow, while a pleasant breeze cools the night air.
Great red strawberries grow here, big as the nose on a dwarf.  The sun shines down on the field, bright and hot, but a pleasant breeze from the west keeps things comfortable.
